questions.subject: ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG
questions.question: What is ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG and what does it do?
questions.answer: ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG is an unofficial extension of the BRIA Background Removal v1.4 model for ComfyUI. It allows users to remove the background from images and videos using the RMBG model.

questions.subject: ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG
questions.question: Is ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG open-source?
questions.answer: Yes, ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG is open-source and its source code is available on GitHub.

questions.subject: ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG
questions.question: What is the current version of ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG?
questions.answer: The current version of ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG is V1.5.

questions.subject: ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG
questions.question: What are the new features in V1.5?
questions.answer: V1.5 includes support for batch processing and a new feature to output mask.

questions.subject: ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG
questions.question: How can I install ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG?
questions.answer: ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG can be installed using the ComfyUI Manager (under development) or manually by following the steps provided in the documentation.

questions.subject: ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG
questions.question: How do I use the nodes in ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG?
questions.answer: After installing the extension, the nodes to use are: BRIA_RMBG Model Loader (which automatically loads the Removal v1.4 model) and BRIA RMBG (for removing the background).

questions.subject: BRIA_RMBG Model Loader
questions.question: What does the BRIA_RMBG Model Loader node do?
questions.answer: The BRIA_RMBG Model Loader node automatically loads the Removal v1.4 model for use in ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG.

questions.subject: BRIA RMBG
questions.question: What is the purpose of the BRIA RMBG node?
questions.answer: The BRIA RMBG node is used for removing the background from images and videos using the RMBG model.
